body: You can save your work and return later using just your email address.We’ll keep your work for [% service#dataRetentionDuration %] days. For your security, we’ll delete any information after this time.

components.html:
It’s quick and easy to set up:

1. Enter your email address.
2. Check your email and use the link we send you to confirm your email address.

That’s it, your work is saved.

**Add your mobile phone for extra security**

If someone else has access to your email, you can make your form more secure using your mobile phone. You’ll be able to do this once you’ve saved your work.

heading: Saving your progress
